short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension loads more replies when you hit the bottom of the page on an Upwork Community thread!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Upwork Community threads' comments are limited to 30 replies per page, and each time you hit the end of the page you have to click another page number from the bottom pagination in the new community interface. This extension lets you load more replies in the old style when you hit the bottom of the page so you you can keep reading the conversation more easily without losing previous replies.

Simply scroll all the way to the bottom of the page and wait for a couple of seconds, and more replies (if available) will be displayed in the same page. Enjoy!
